name: Wizard Battle! (DEMO)
description: Wizard Battle is a Online Wizard Fighter where you play as a wizard and try to collect powers to defeat your friends! Choose your custom modes and maps and Battle It out with your friends! New maps and Spells coming out very soon! Have fun with your friends and battle it out in a 1v1 or in a 2v2! It's your fight in Wizard Battle (WARNING) Please do not choose Village as it is in development!
